@Steps.welcome: Welcome to Horarioz, let's get started?
@Steps.introduction: We will ask you a few questions to set up your account. Don't worry, it will take less than 5 minutes.
@Steps.you-can-change-later: Remember, you can change all of this later whenever you want.
@Steps.you-answered-all-questions: You have answered all the questions. Thank you! We wish you all the success in the world with this incredible company.
@Steps.domain-already-exists: This domain is already in use by another company
@Steps.whats-your-company-slug: What will be your website domain?
@Steps.slug-information: With this website, people can access and stay informed about your company's news and book services quickly and easily. To do that, you need to register a domain so that people can access it. Remember to choose something simple, easy to remember, and related to your company name or business.

@ServiceList.loading-services-please-wait: We are loading your services, please wait.
@ServiceList.lets-start-creating-service: Let's start by creating your first service!
@ServiceList.click-to-create-service: Click here to create a service
@ServiceList.name: Name

@ServiceForm.create-service-description: Here you can create or edit a service that will be displayed on your website and scheduled by your clients.
@ServiceForm.service-created-successfully: The service "{{name}}" has been created successfully.
@ServiceForm.service-updated-successfully: The service "{{name}}" has been updated successfully.
@ServiceForm.duration-invalid-format: The service duration is in an invalid format. It should follow the pattern: HH:MM
@ServiceForm.price-required: A price for the service is required or put 0 for free
@ServiceForm.service-description-placeholder: "One hour of training with the best personal trainer in the region. Personalized training to help you achieve your goals."

@DeleteServiceModal.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete the service "{{name}}"?

curiosities.0: The human DNA, when fully stretched, can reach a distance of about 10 billion kilometers.
curiosities.1: The metal mercury is liquid at room temperature, making it unique among metallic elements.
curiosities.2: The human brain is more active at night than during the day.
curiosities.3: Light takes approximately 8 minutes and 20 seconds to travel from the Sun to the Earth.
curiosities.4: Scientists have discovered that bees can recognize human faces, which is an impressive ability for an insect.
